Dear Dave,

That would be great if you could send me this mechanism in Cant=
era
format. Do I "only" have to exchange the Pt-mechanism in the example
fi=
le surfreactor.m? Or what else do I have to change when I am trying
to mode=
l a plug flow reactor at constant pressure and constant volume? 
Can I just=
 neglect the "setExpansionRateCoeff"? but then for what do I
need the wall?=


Thanx a lot for your help.

Claud

>
> Yes, we do this using the recent m=
echanism developed by Prof. Olaf

I can send you their reaction
